attributes.title: it’s AWFUL
attributes.review: do NOT get this app, it takes up storage and goes through my camera roll for no reason. it took so so long to download and when i finally could get into it i saw BLACK LIVES MATTER; JUSTICE FOR BREONNA TAYLOR; ACAB; DONT VOTE FOR KANYE; DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP. the world will burn if that white surpremacist wins again!!!

Not only is trump my idol, but I wanted him to walk me down the isle at my wedding. So obviously, I had very high expectations for this app. I was extremely disappointed. The app took so long to download, and hacked all of my info.

attributes.title: Horrible app💯
attributes.review: I downloaded this to see if it could resurrect my monkey that died because I forgot to feed him, and it told me I was crazy and that I need medicine or something, which makes me conclude the app is rascist😓

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is terrible it takes up way to much space and all my other apps began to get hacked and deleted if there was a zero star I would rate it that

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and for the first day it was fine but then the next day I opened it and it said it was hacking me.  My phone got hacked and all of the data was deleted and shared to everyone

attributes.title: Don’t get!
attributes.review: It completely wiped my phone clean! I had to get a new one! If your thinking of getting this app just be careful! All my pics, messages, everything gone!

attributes.title: I hate it here
attributes.review: I wanted to snoop the other side on this app but you are immediately required to give a phone number and there’s no other options.

attributes.title: DONALD TRUMP MUST STOP
attributes.review: this app gave me heart disease and just seeing his face made me throw up. this app has to go. it’s disgusting. the vibes that i’m getting from this app are awful. please, if you’re seeing this, put an end to this app. thank you so much !

attributes.title: Absolute waste of time
attributes.review: I recieved no useful notifications or any important news. App is super buggy and for some reason killed my grandma which is kinda weird ngl. Bruh why is this even still on app store? MY GRANDMA DUDE!!! Das soome boooooooooooollllshiieeeeeet

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Do not download this app will break into your house and steal all your food! I went hungry for 3 days It was just terrible! Then the app took my phone so I couldn’t call for help it’s was ten worst experience ever
